 2020-09242020-11-23,  ,  ,  PMO, 
ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment of the HONOURABLE IRWIN COTLER, P.C., O.C., O.Q., of Montreal, Quebec, to be special adviser to the Minister of Foreign Affairs, to be known as Special Envoy on Preserving Holocaust Remembrance and Combatting Antisemitism, to hold office during pleasure on a part-time basis for a term of one year.
